channel.title: Class idea The Bastard Prince
channel.description: I'm surprised that a game inspired by game of thrones has no class whose goal is to be king. Here are some ideas, feel free to reject them. The Bastard Prince (Neutral)- same abilities as prince but their win condition is to Become The King, their class can help either faction all while pretending to be the real prince. since the bastard's rivals the king and prince have night immune he has to fight them for the crown indirectly through intimidation,deceit, or allying with evil

item.title: Class idea The Bastard Prince
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
but you can just execute the prince

Read full topic

item.title: Class idea The Bastard Prince
item.dc:creator: WyrmWyrd
item.description:
Yeah it does I guess it would belong more in a new game mode where the evil faction is a rival for the throne.

Read full topic
